body: @VoidTraveler Jirou could use improvement in his art style but I am kinda ok with even if he didn't. There is this strange classic charm about his art(my opinion). Though he isn't active anymore about this genre(he toned down with police arrest jokes and not the usual bad ending of his previous works) which is kinda sad.
@Quadamputee Maniac This guy still has a long way to go if he wants to get to Jirou level. But then again, Jirou himself could use a lot of improvement in his art style.

Probably inspired by this old underated classic. Momoyama Jirou
https://nhentai.net/g/162118/93/
Left to right reading sucks ass so not gonna fav, even tho i kinda dig this 'chad-thundercock' slavery style.
this is almost word for word an old Fansadox comic
